text: Anata gata no ma ni arra no shito ga iru koto o shire. Kare ga moshi oku no kotogara ni tsuite anata gata ni shitagattanaraba, anata gata wa kitto fuko ni ochitta kotodearou. Daga arra wa, anata gata ni shinko o konomashi mono to nasa re, mata anata gata no kokoro o, sore ni fusawashiku shite, anata gata ni fushinjin to jaaku to hangyaku o kirau yo ni nasa reta. Kore wa tadashiku michibika reta monodearu
